title: Unexpected exception thrown for TimeTickChannel-0
body:
2020-06-24 02:36:36.012-04:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | ESC[37mSync Event  *** Current slot: 72396, Head slot: 8219, Connected peers: 11ESC[0m
2020-06-24 02:36:48.058-04:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | ERROR | teku-status-log | PLEASE FIX OR REPORT | Unexpected exception thrown for TimeTickChannel-0
java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: ProtoArray: Invalid delta length
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.encodeThrowable(CompletableFuture.java:314) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniAcceptNow(CompletableFuture.java:757) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniAcceptStage(CompletableFuture.java:731) ~[?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.thenAccept(CompletableFuture.java:2108) ~[?:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.util.async.SafeFuture.thenAccept(SafeFuture.java:299) ~[teku-util-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.storage.store.Store$Transaction.commit(Store.java:537) ~[teku-storage-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.services.beaconchain.SlotProcessor.processSlotWhileSyncing(SlotProcessor.java:126) ~[teku-services-beaconchain-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.services.beaconchain.SlotProcessor.onTick(SlotProcessor.java:96) ~[teku-services-beaconchain-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.services.beaconchain.BeaconChainController.onTick(BeaconChainController.java:507) ~[teku-services-beaconchain-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at jdk.internal.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor2.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
        at jdk.internal.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43) ~[?:?]
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:566) ~[?:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.events.DirectEventDeliverer.executeMethod(DirectEventDeliverer.java:70) ~[teku-events-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.events.DirectEventDeliverer.deliverTo(DirectEventDeliverer.java:53) ~[teku-events-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.events.AsyncEventDeliverer.lambda$deliverTo$0(AsyncEventDeliverer.java:60) ~[teku-events-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.events.AsyncEventDeliverer$QueueReader.deliverNextEvent(AsyncEventDeliverer.java:111) [teku-events-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.events.AsyncEventDeliverer$QueueReader.run(AsyncEventDeliverer.java:103) [teku-events-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1128) [?:?]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:628) [?:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:834) [?:?]
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: ProtoArray: Invalid delta length
        at com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument(Preconditions.java:142) ~[guava-28.1-jre.jar:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.protoarray.ProtoArray.applyScoreChanges(ProtoArray.java:155) ~[teku-protoarray-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.protoarray.ProtoArrayForkChoiceStrategyUpdater.updateForkChoiceWeights(ProtoArrayForkChoiceStrategyUpdater.java:175) ~[teku-protoarray-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at java.util.Optional.ifPresent(Optional.java:183) ~[?:?]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.protoarray.ProtoArrayForkChoiceStrategyUpdater.commit(ProtoArrayForkChoiceStrategyUpdater.java:88) ~[teku-protoarray-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.storage.store.StoreTransactionUpdates.applyToStore(StoreTransactionUpdates.java:270) ~[teku-storage-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at tech.pegasys.teku.storage.store.Store$Transaction.lambda$commit$0(Store.java:543) ~[teku-storage-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.0-dev-1bcf7d0d]
        at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniAcceptNow(CompletableFuture.java:753) ~[?:?]
        ... 18 more
2020-06-24 02:36:49.343-04:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | ESC[37mSync Event  *** Current slot: 72397, Head slot: 8219, Connected peers: 12ESC[0m
Thanks for making an issue about this. I've recently started seeing this error in my logs as well. I'll be looking into it right away.
We've reverted the PRs that caused this issue so we shouldn't see this issue again.
